explorer.title: API Explorer
explorer.intro: Use this form to perform raw queries on the APIs.
explorer.settingsRequired: You need to have set up your Username and Secret, as well as Data Centre Environment in the Settings section first.

editor.title: API Argument Editor
editor.intro: Use the editor to build up your arguments.

api.label: Select API
api.required: The API is required to be able to run the request.

method.label: Select Method
method.required: The method is required to be able to run the request.

arguments.label: Arguments
arguments.required: You must supply the arguments to the request.

users.title: Manage Users
users.intro: This is a list of all logins associated with your credentials.
users.noRecords: We couldn't find any logins you can access

details.title: Login Details
details.intro: View details associated with the login.

groups.noGroups: The login does not belong to any groups.

credentials.title: Details for Credentials
credentials.intro: Details about the credentials you are currently authenticated against.

groups.title: Group Membership
groups.norecords: Your credentials don't belong to any groups.

details.title: Info
details.intro: Information associated with the credentials you are logged in with.

company.title: Company
company.intro: Details and configuration related to the company of the credentials you are logged in against.

reportsuites.title: Your Report Suites
reportsuites.intro: These are all the report suites that your Security credentials give you access to.
reportsuites.noRecords: No report suites were found for your credentials.

groups.title: Report Suite Groups
groups.intro: View all the groups that this Report Suite is a member of.

settings.title: Report Suite Settings
settings.intro: View all the settings of this report suite..

general.title: General
general.intro: General settings of the report suite.

videosettings.title: Video Settings
videosettings.intro: Video settings of the report suite.

mobilebreakdowns.title: Mobile Breakdowns
mobilebreakdowns.intro: Mobile Breakdowns of the report suite.

environment.title: Data Centres
environment.intro: These are the data centres available in the system.

values.norecords: No environments were found to display.

groups.title: Manage Groups
groups.intro: View all the details about your groups here.

reportsuites.title: Report Suites
reportsuites.intro: Report Suites that this Group has access too.

users.title: Logins
users.intro: The following logins are memebers of this group.

reportaccess.title: Report Access
reportaccess.intro: This group has access to the following reports..
